Title: Maximum Subarray Sum II
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to find the maximum sum of values in a contiguous subarray with length between a and b.
Input Specification:
The first input line has three integers n, a and b: the size of the array and the minimum and maximum subarray length. 
 The second line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the array values.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the maximum subarray sum.
